messages.message: Do we have an examples, in guides / docs / training for how to send / retrieve data from external services to Instabase. NatWest are after an example and say they can only find UDF samples for refiner and not external interfaces.

Hi @Aimé, I think you can use the File System APIs to at least send file contents from an external system to IB (the other way would be using UDF to consume the external system service via the python request lib maybe). The ‘write content to a file API doc’ is good to explain how this can be done as a REST communication to IB: https://instabase.com/docs/reference/apis/filesystem/#write-content-to-a-file-api.
PS: if that helps, I am meant to create a short video for Ben to illustrate how to use File systems APIs from post-man or standalone notebooks. Let me know if you’re interested.
Similarly, if the endpoints are databases at IB, then the database APIs can also be used: https://instabase.com/docs/reference/apis/database-table/#execute-a-query
